title: Gall Force 1: Eternal Story
synopsis: Two advanced civilizations, the Paranoids (a race of alien humanoids) and the Solenoids (who are all women) are waging a war that has gone on for centuries. When the Solenoid fleet leaves a battle to defend an experimentally terraformed world from the Paranoids, one damaged Solenoid ship, the Star Leaf, is separated from the fleet.
related_anime: ['Scramble Wars: Tsuppashire! Genom Trophy Rally', 'Gall Force: The Revolution', 'Gall Force 2: Destruction', 'Ten Little Gall Force']
voices: ['Matsui, Naoko', 'Watanabe, Naoko', 'Yamamoto, Yuriko', 'Hara, Eriko', 'Kawamura, Maria', 'Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Tomizawa, Michie']
